episode.title: Podcast Amnesia
episode.author: Daring Fireball / John Gruber
episode.description: Jason Snell returns to the show. Topics include Apple and China, the 10th anniversary of the iPhone SDK, the future of the MacBook Air, and more. No baseball talk, except a little.
episode.showNotes:
Jason Snell returns to the show. Topics include Apple and China, the 10th anniversary of the iPhone SDK, the future of the MacBook Air, and more. No baseball talk, except a little.

Sponsored by:

  • Squarespace: Make your next move. Use code talkshow for 10% off your first order.
  • Away: Travel smarter with the suitcase that charges your phone. Get $20 off with code talkshow.
  • Casper: You can be sure of your purchase with Casper’s 100 night risk-free, sleep-on-it trial.

Links:

  • Script Debugger 7.
  • BBEdit 12.
  • Keyboard Maestro.
  • Craig Hockenberry on the 10th anniversary of the iPhone SDK.
  • Lights Out — the first iPhone game.
  • John Oliver’s “Last Week Tonight” segment on NRA TV.
  • AR-15 church blessing (not a joke).
  • Jason’s Macworld column on the weird current state and future of the MacBook Air.
  • A 5-minute podcast with Merlin Mann interviewing Jason Snell and yours truly, recorded immediately after the announcement of the original iPhone, wherein Jason predicts the App Store.

This episode of The Talk Show was edited by Caleb Sexton.
